tool_description: Builds comprehensive parameter sets for different negotiation scenarios including wage increases, benefit changes, and economic assumptions.

base_wage_increase.description: Base wage increase percentage for the scenario

scenario_type.description: Type of scenario: conservative, moderate, aggressive

error_messages: Invalid scenario name: Scenario name must be a non-empty string with no special characters.
Invalid wage increase: Base wage increase must be between -5 and 25 percent.
Invalid scenario type: Scenario type must be one of: conservative, moderate, aggressive.
Scenario conflict: The wage increase level conflicts with the specified scenario type.
usage: Provide scenario_name, base_wage_increase, and scenario_type to generate a complete parameter set for modeling. Returns structured parameters for use in cost projections and analysis.

risk_level.description: Risk assessment level for the scenario
